title: Fun-Filled Phuket Escape with Four-Storey Waterslide, Daily Breakfast, Daily Lunch or Dinner & Nightly Cocktails
description:
Make memories that last a lifetime at Pamookkoo Resort just moments from Phuket's sparkling Kata Beach. This beachside sanctuary promises entertainment for all ages with sun, surf and sand covered. Plunge into the resort's adventure pool featuring a four-storey waterslide and kids' splash zone, drink and dine across three restaurants and bars, and little ones can find hours of fun and entertainment at Kids' World.

The resort is located a breezy 450 metres from the pristine esplanade and dazzling waters of Kata Beach - considered one of Thailand's most loved. Once you've cooled off in the sapphire waters, make Pamookkoo your base for exploring the island. You’ll be a short 15-minute drive from the Phuket Big Buddha and a five-minute drive from the stunning views of the Andaman Sea from atop Karon Viewpoint.
offer_address: 70 1 Kata Rd, Karon, Mueang Phuket District, Phuket 83100, Thailand

title: Five-Star Pullman Phuket Beachfront Escape with All-Inclusive Dining, Massages & Nightly Free-Flow Drinks Hour
description:
Treat yourself to an all-inclusive tropical escape at Pullman Phuket Panwa Beach Resort, a five-star oasis nestled in a secluded location on the southeastern tip of Phuket. Overlooking picturesque Makham Bay and the sparkling Andaman Sea, this tropical haven - backed by the internationally famed Accor brand - is the perfect place for a complete flop-and-drop escape, with all you could need for relaxation and rejuvenation. Spend your days tasting the flavours of Thailand at Tamarind restaurant, sipping coffee at The Junction lounge, or devouring cocktails and club sandwiches at the poolside Edge Beach Club.

Drop the little ones off at Sapparot Kids' Club, before checking into Talay Spa for indulgent scrubs and massages. Laze the day away in a luxury cabana by the huge lagoon pool or entertain all ages with the hotel's family-friendly program of fun-filled activities, including kayaking, paddle boarding and table tennis. Should you be in search of a little action, Phuket's technicolour Old Town is just a short 20-minute drive away.
offer_address: 44/5 Moo 8 Sakdidesh Road, Vichit, Muang Phuket 83000, Thailand

title: Five-Star Phuket Beachfront Resort with All-Inclusive Drinks & Dining
description:
Soak up the sun and escape the crowds at the five-star Centara Grand Beach Resort Phuket - an award-winning paradise with impressive colonial-inspired architecture. A beachfront oasis neighbouring the beautiful sugar-fine sands of Karon Beach, this peaceful gem is just a one-hour drive from Phuket International Airport.

Anyone yearning for an escape right on the white crescent beachfront will enjoy Centara Grand Beach Resort Phuket's elegant and spacious rooms, scattered among perfectly manicured gardens, and the glistening Andaman Sea vistas throughout the resort. This opulent resort will exceed all expectations of paradise with its myriad of luxe facilities. Plunge into one of four swimming pools (including an adults-only pool), experience exceptional all-inclusive drinks and dining at a host of bars and restaurants, slip down the slides at the onsite waterpark and step out onto the secluded beachfront to sink your toes into a luxurious stretch of powder-white sands. Whether travelling as a couple, with friends or family, Centara Grand Beach Resort Phuket welcomes you with its five-star facilities, pristine beachfront, fun kids' activities and tranquil spa.
offer_address: 683 Karon Beach, Patak Rd, Karon, Mueang Phuket District, Phuket 83100, Thailand

description:

Anyone yearning for an escape will enjoy this peaceful gem - elegant and spacious rooms are scattered among perfectly manicured gardens, with glistening Andaman Sea vistas throughout the resort. Completing the postcard-perfect picture is a myriad of luxe facilities: plunge into one of four swimming pools (including an adults-only pool), indulge in exceptional drinks and dining at a host of bars and restaurants, and step out onto the secluded beachfront and sink into the warm, shimmering waters. 

There's something here for every member of the family, with an onsite waterpark and two kids' clubs to keep the little ones entertained, while adults can find tranquillity at the world-class SPA Cenvaree. Located only 15 minutes from the charming Karon Village and the colourful shopping and dining options of Patong, and within easy reach of scuba diving sites, golf courses, watersports and local attractions, there's no better base for your Thailand adventure - and all just an hour's drive from Phuket International Airport.

title: Tranquil Meliá Phuket Beachfront Retreat with All-Inclusive Dining & Nightly Drinks
description:
Experience pristine luxury at the tranquil five-star Meliá Phuket Mai Khao, a tropical retreat beautifully nestled on eight acres of secluded sands on the longest beach in northern Phuket. An indulgent wellness-inspired sanctuary, this secluded haven encourages a complete 'flop and drop' holiday, with all you could need for days of relaxation and rejuvenation. Designed to create a relaxing and restorative atmosphere, this ultra-luxe oasis combines local elegance, contemporary aesthetics and renowned Meliá hospitality.

Spend sunkissed days in your private outdoor tub or pool, align your chakras with beachfront yoga, soothe and stretch your muscles with a visit to the luxurious YHI Spa, or plunge into the glistening infinity pool overlooking the cerulean Andaman Sea. Stroll along Mai Khao Beach, sinking your toes into sugar-white sands lapped by impossibly blue waters or, for a day out, head to Sirinat National Park, the Mai Khao Marine Turtle Foundation, and the outstanding Wat Phra Thong temple. In the evenings, share a special moment at Sasa restaurant and celebrate into the late evening at the chic Gaia restaurant and bar.
offer_address: 233 Mai Khao, Tambon Mai Khao, Amphur Thalang, Phuket 83110, Thailand

title: Beachside Phuket Serenity with Guaranteed Upgrade, Daily Buffet Breakfast & Gourmet Three-Course Dinner
description:
Set above the sequestered waters of Kalim Bay, The Nature Phuket is a tranquil island sanctuary framed by leafy tropical greenery. With a focus on comfort and hospitality, the hotel charms one and all with its lush landscaping - three swimming pools and koi pond included - as well as bright, spacious rooms and friendly service. The Neon Rooftop Bar turns it up for sunset, with sweeping views of the Andaman Sea. Three onsite restaurants serve vibrant international dishes, while adventurous diners will love discovering local flavours from nearby street vendors.

The hotel provides a free shuttle service to the resort community of Patong, whose smooth waters off its three-kilometre stretch of golden sand beach are perfect for jet-skiing, hang-gliding, and kayaking. Those who stay 'til sundown will revel in watching the bars and discotheques on flashy Bangla Road and the Paradise Complex come to life.
offer_address: 322 Kammala - Patong Rd, Pa Tong, Kathu District, Phuket 83150, Thailand

title: Phuket Beachfront Oasis with All-Inclusive Meals, Evening Cocktails & Massages
description:
Forget about the rest of the world and discover a dreamy Thailand escape at Diamond Cliff Resort & Spa in Northern Patong. With a picturesque hillside location, the resort is a secluded hideaway with jaw-dropping views of the Andaman Sea and some of the best sunset views along the west coast, all just moments from Patong’s buzzing downtown area.

Spend balmy days swimming in the pool overlooking the ocean, or paddle beneath a cascade in the Waterfall Pool (where you’ll enjoy waterslides, a swim-up bar, and a splash zone). The Diamond Spa is an oasis of tranquility: treat yourself to a massage, facial, or body scrub during your stay. Take your tastebuds on a journey with three exquisite restaurants and three ultra-cool bars to choose from. Diamond Cliff Resort and Spa has been stamped with a Tripadvisor Travellers’ Choice 2021 award, ranking it in the top 10% of resorts worldwide. When you’re ready to tear yourself away from the resort's fabulous facilities, Patong city centre is a swift five-minute free shuttle ride away. Here you can enjoy shopping at Jungceylon Shopping Mall and Bangla Road Walking Street, exciting nightlife and endless dining venues. When you’re craving a beach day, Sea Salt Beach is on your doorstep.
offer_address: 284 Phrabaramee Road, Pa Tong, Kathu District, Phuket 83150, Thailand

Situated on the golden sands of Kata Noi Beach with unrivalled views of the sparkling Andaman Sea, this is undoubtedly one of Phuket's finest resorts. This beachfront retreat is all about luxury, with multiple restaurants and bars, nine incredible swimming pools and an indulgent haven of relaxation in Tew Son Spa. There's a daily shuttle to Patong and Phuket, as well as a tour desk to arrange a variety of exciting excursions. Neighbouring the beautiful sugar-fine sands of Karon Beach, this peaceful gem is just an hour's drive from Phuket International Airport and a 15-minute tuk-tuk ride from the vibrant shopping and dining mecca of Patong - where you’ll find some of the island’s best nightlife, restaurants and markets.

Anyone yearning for an escape will enjoy the resort's elegant and spacious rooms, scattered among perfectly manicured gardens and fantastic facilities - including three pools, three restaurants and two bars, the indulgent InBalance Spa and a Kids' Club. title: Fun-Filled Phuket Escape on the Shores of Bang Tao Beach with All-Inclusive Daily Dining, Massages & Kids Stay Free
description:
Experience the ultimate fun-filled escape at Angsana Laguna Phuket on the shores of Bang Tao Beach. Awarded a Tripadvisor Traveller’s Choice award for 2021, it is surrounded by a glittering lagoon with an endless supply of exciting activities on offer. Dive into the 300-metre lagoon-stype swimming pool, go paddleboarding across the lagoon and order cocktails at the ritzy swim-up bar and lounge on a cabana at Xana Beach Club, one of the most popular beach clubs on the island. Or, drop the little ones off at Angsana Kids’ Club, the first treehouse-style kids' club in Phuket for a day filled with treasure hunts, face painting and cooking classes, while you treat yourself to a traditional Thai massage at the luxe Angsana Spa.

The resort is part of a wider complex where you can tee off at an award-winning 18-hole golf course, dine in an abundance of restaurants and explore stunningly manicured landscapes. Daily shuttle services operate every 30 minutes from the resort and zip across the complex, making exploration easy. A few kilometres away, you can indulge in shopping at the open-air malls, Porto de Phuket or Boat Avenue which has a weekly night market.
offer_address: 10 Moo 4, Srisoonthorn Road Cherngtalay, Thalang District, Phuket 83110, Thailand

Fine dine with views over the glistening ocean on the Moon Terrace or swim up to collect a tipple without missing a beat at Waterfall Pool Bar. Venture out of your beachfront oasis onto the golden sands of Patong Beach, only a short drive away, or explore the quaint Kamala Village right on the resort’s doorstep. For a dose of culture and history, take a 40-minute drive to the lively Phuket Old Town, where colourful Sino-Portuguese townhouses and all sorts of fabulous street foods line the bustling lanes. After dark, head back to the resort to experience lively family-oriented shows, perfect for ending the day on a high.

vendor_name: Cape Sienna Phuket Gourmet Hotel & Villas
title: Luxe Oceanfront Phuket Retreat with All-Inclusive Dining & Daily Cocktails
description:
Escape to Phuket’s high-end 'Millionaire’s Mile' and indulge in a postcard-perfect break at Cape Sienna Phuket Gourmet Hotel & Villas, a cosmopolitan resort perched on the coastline overlooking serene Kamala Bay. With uninterrupted sea views from almost every corner, this tranquil haven dials up the romance, offering pure indulgence with a side of beachside bliss.

Every room or suite has a front-row seat to the Andaman Sea, as well as the exceptional restaurants and bars. Peel your eyes away from the floor-to-ceiling windows at the ultra-romantic Plum Prime Steakhouse to focus on the charcoal oven, where prime cuts of beef and fresh seafood are expertly prepared, or venture to Vanilla Sky Bar & Gastro Pub for cocktails on the ocean-view terrace. Switch between lazing in the infinity pool and sipping on cocktails at the open-air Sienna Rocks Café & Pool Club by the Sea, or slip into the resort's infinity pool lined with palm-fringed cabanas and a poolside restaurant. Restore mind and body with a traditional Thai massage or deep-cleansing facial at Balance Spa or, if you’ve got extra energy to burn, rally on the rooftop tennis court and get your blood pumping in the stylish gym.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- All-inclusive dining featuring a daily breakfast buffet and daily set-menu lunch and dinner at The Poolside Bar & Restaurant
- Sip a daily cocktail, beer, wine or spirit with mixer each at The Poolside Bar & Restaurant
- Relax with a minimum of one 30-minute massage per adult at Balance Spa
- Your tropical escape begins with a one-way transfer from Phuket Airport on arrival

**Extended Stay Bonus:** Stay 7+ nights and enjoy not only an upgraded signature set dining experience for two (to replace one dining experience during your stay) but a 60-minute massage reach and return transfers from Phuket Airport for a truly tranquil escape. Upgrade to a 10+ night escape and relax with double the 60-minute massages each. 

**Honeymoon Upgrade:** Ignite the romance in a Sea View Honeymoon Suite with a private jacuzzi, draped king bed and stunning views over the bay.

**Book with 100% Confidence:** If for whatever reason you don’t want to go on your holiday, you can cancel right up to 14 days before check-in and get a 100% credit to use at Luxury Escapes for any other accommodation offer. Excludes flights, see the Fine Print for details.

title: Award-Winning Thailand Pool Villas with Degustation Dinner, Daily Breakfast, Nightly Drinks & Roundtrip Transfers
description:
Perched amid Phuket's lush rainforest overlooking the azure Andaman, Keemala is an exotic tropical escape from everyday life. Ranked in the top 10% of resorts worldwide and stamped with Tripadvisor Travellers’ Choice, as well as recently awarded Regional Winner for Luxury Eco Resort at the 2021 World Luxury Hotel Awards, this architectural wonder has been expertly crafted for honeymooners, romantics and those who seek out truly unique stays.

Intricately weaving the tales, construction techniques, and spiritual philosophies of four fictitious clans that may have once inhabited the island, Keemala integrates its 38 bespoke villas effortlessly, evoking a sense of escapism - from nomadic luxury tents inspired by the 'Pa-ta-pea' Wanderer clan to treehouses shrouded by verdant canopies. Live in tune with nature, with each villa boasting its own earthy, elemental aesthetic, private plunge pool, personal balcony, and carefully considered details dedicated to these mythical peoples' stories and cultures. Elsewhere, Mala Spa’s eight treatment rooms are perfect for indulging the body and invigorating the mind with the best of modern pampering regimes, while Keemala's immersive and sustainable cuisine approach at Mala Restaurant, Mala Bar and Cha-La Pool Bar will leave a lasting impression.

Inspired by the Japanese wabi-sabi philosophy - which promotes a deep connection to nature and finding beauty in imperfection - this pristine sanctuary boasts a rustic and straightforward charm. Raw elegance is interwoven into every aspect of the resort, from the jade-hued resort pool to the wood-panelled villas climbing up the hillside. Upon arrival at this dreamy destination, feel instantly at peace as you relax poolside and sip on a refreshing cocktail from Sanya Coffee Bar & Wine before treating your taste buds to native Thai flavours at The Rice restaurant.

Start each morning with a hearty buffet breakfast and decide how you wish to spend your day - indulge in a bespoke treatment at Jamuna Spa or venture away from the resort's grounds and make the short, seven-minute drive to bustling Patong Beach. One of the most popular beaches in Thailand, Patong Beach boasts endless restaurants, bars and boutiques, along with the sprawling Jungceylon retail centre - a shopper's oasis that guarantees hours of entertainment. When you've had your fill of strolling the streets of Patong, find a stretch of sand and listen to waves crashing against the shore as your worries melt away in the Thailand sun.

You’ll be less than a five-minute walk from Rawai Pier and its famous seafood village, less than a 10-minute drive from Chalong Bay rum distillery - and possibly the best mojito in the country - and only a 20-minute drive from the gleaming Big Buddha that rules the island’s mighty rainforested peaks.

description:
Discover quintessential Thai tropical bliss at The Village Coconut Island, an all-inclusive resort perched on the white sands of Koh Maphrao, off the east coast of Phuket. This exclusive resort is the place to get away for a stress-free holiday. Enjoy palm-fringed pools, private beaches, all-inclusive premium dining, free-flow drinks and enough activities to keep even the most agile entertained for days on end. And with a water taxi service available to Phuket's mainland, you can explore the many nearby night markets, bars and beaches any time of the day or night.

Camp out in your favourite cabana on the sand day after day, spend hours in the dazzling infinity pools or leave your head and shoulders in the hands of expert therapists at Kahtor Spa, which offers traditional Thai treatments and a stunning hydrotherapy pool. Adventure enthusiasts can take to the sea via kayak or longtail boat to explore surrounding waters or get the blood pumping on land with mountain biking, Thai boxing, tennis or use of the state-of-the-art fitness centre. When you're ready to refuel, let the aromas of sweet curry and ginger tempt you to taste beachside Kabang Restaurant & Bar's artfully prepared Thai classics, or wander to Kucina Restaurant, where the caress of light jazz and flames from the wood-fired pizza oven tantalize one and all.

Fall in love with this magically secluded corner of southeast Phuket at the tranquil five-star Cape Panwa Hotel, a tropical retreat boasting luxurious private beach access. This tropical haven is perfect for couples, families or groups of friends looking to reconnect in paradise. Enjoy the luxuries of mouth-watering all-inclusive dining at three of the restaurants, serving both international favourites and local Thai flavours. The only decision you will have to make each day is which of the two shimmering pools you will lounge by: the main pool is surrounded by cabanas, pool chairs and endless swaying palm trees, while the beachside pool offers spectacular views over the cool blue waters of the Andaman Sea - no matter which you choose, do it with a cocktail in hand.

Head to the blissful Cape Spa for a day of indulgent pampering with the included traditional Siamese Touch Massage to rejuvenate the mind, body and soul. Relax on the postcard-perfect private beach, seeking out your own slice of tropical paradise, take to the Andaman Sea for a snorkelling expedition through the unbelievably clear waters, or indulge in an array of cultural experiences.

You’ll only be a 20-minute drive from many of the island’s best sights, including Phuket Old Town and always-happening Patong. Situated just off the east coast of Phuket, The Village Coconut Island boasts exclusive seclusion in an all-inclusive setting. Indulge in a luxurious seven or ten-night stay with daily buffet breakfast, daily buffet or a la carte lunch, nightly dinners at your choice of two restaurants, afternoon snacks and light bites, free-flow alcoholic drinks, two 60-minute spa treatments to share, VIP airport pickup and more.
offer_address: 51/7 Moo 6, T.KOHKAEW, PHUKET, A MUANG, Phuket 83200, Thailand

title: Grand Opening: Adults-Only Phuket Beachfront Glamping with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Cocktails
description:
Forget everything you thought you knew about camping, this tented paradise takes glamping to dizzying new heights. This adults-only gem is perched between Bangtao's sugar-soft sands and lush tropical gardens, creating a world where jungle vibes meet five-star service and "roughing it" means deciding between your private pool or the turquoise Andaman Sea.

Behind every elegant tent flap lies a sanctuary of sophisticated comfort, with rainfall showers, sumptuous king beds and stylish living spaces. Whether beachfront or lagoon-side, these hideaways are indoor-outdoor living done right. The indulgence extends beyond the sand with a complimentary day cruise aboard a 76-foot luxury motor yacht, where the welcome drinks are cold and the ocean vistas melt into the horizon.

Days here unfold at your pace, whether lounging by crystalline pools, surrendering to blissful Thai massages or feasting at one of the resort's gourmet hotspots. Just steps from Bangtao Beach's golden curve, yet worlds away from the everyday, this is where barefoot luxury gets a chic makeover.
offer_address: Bangtao Beach 202 88, Cherngtalay, Thalang, Phuket 83110, Thailand

vendor_name: The Old Phuket - Karon Beach Resort
title: A Relaxing Getaway in the Heart of Phuket
description: Get ready for your dream tropical getaway with a stay at The Old Phuket - Karon Beach Resort. Boasting a prime location in Karon Beach, you’ll be a stone’s throw from one of Phuket’s most beloved beaches. Relax and unwind at this beautiful resort offering stylish Sino-Portuguese décor and fabulous amenities. Treat yourself to a dreamy escape complete with two delicious dinners, daily buffet breakfast, a blissful 60-minute foot massage, four refreshing cocktails and return transfers from Phuket Airport.
location_description: The Old Phuket - Karon Beach Resort
offer_address: 192/36 Koron Road, T.Karon, A.Muang, Chang Wat Phuket 83100, Thailand

title: Phuket All-Inclusive Oceanfront Oasis near Patong Beach with Massages & Unlimited Free-Flow Drinks
description:
Discover a dreamy Thai escape at this five-star retreat, a picturesque cliffside hideaway in Phuket. Boasting spectacular views of the Andaman Sea and the rolling hills of North Patong, this idyllic resort is ideally placed for soaking up the sun or the local culture, sitting moments from the buzzing downtown area and Patong Beach.

Spend balmy days swimming in one of the resort’s stunning ocean-view pools, indulge in a day of tranquillity at Diamond Spa, or take your tastebuds on a culinary journey with three exquisite restaurants and three ultra-cool bars to choose from.

Diamond Cliff Resort & Spa is surrounded by lush vegetation, yet is just steps from the waves of the pristine Sea Salt Beach and the cool, calm waters of JB Sunset Beach. 

When you’re ready to tear yourself away from the hotel's glorious amenities, Patong’s exciting city centre is a short five-minute shuttle ride away - shop at Jungceylon Shopping Mall and Bangla Road Walking Street, hit up the city’s thrilling nightlife and explore endless dining venues.
offer_address: 284 Phrabaramee Road, Pa Tong, Kathu District, Phuket 83150, Thailand

vendor_name: Hilton Garden Inn Phuket Bang Tao
title: Phuket Hilton Island Splendour with Two Rooftop Pools, Daily Breakfast & Nightly Drinks
description:
Bang Tao's crown jewel awaits at this inviting escape, striking the perfect balance between contemporary comfort and tropical authenticity. Perched between emerald hills and azure waters, this hotel serves up that irresistible 'sanuk' - Thailand's recipe for pure bliss. Your island story unfolds perfectly here, whether chasing sunrise adventures or melting into golden hour magic.

Twin rooftop pools top this sanctuary while The Garden Grille Restaurant and Bar orchestrates a symphony of bold flavours. The Pool Bar offers a range of cocktails, beers and wine with unobstructed views over Laguna Phuket. Located just steps from the sand, this is your tropical launchpad for sun, spice and serenity.
location_description: Hilton Garden Inn Phuket Bang Tao
offer_address: 111 Soi Cherngtalay 16, Choeng Thale, Thalang District, Phuket 83110, Thailand

title: Phuket Family-Friendly Beachfront Resort with Eight Pools, Daily Breakfast & Nightly Dinner
description: With the dream combination of pristine beaches and accommodating amenities, Sunwing Kamala Beach resort offers the ultimate family-friendly getaway in Phuket. Boasting eight spectacular swimming pools complete with waterslides and a swim-up bar, splashy fun is never far away. Pamper yourself with a soothing traditional massage, while little ones party it up at the entertaining Lollo & Bernie Club. Venture out of your beachfront oasis onto the golden sands of Kamala Beach, explore the quaint Kamala Village right on the resort’s doorstep or for a dose of culture and history, take a 40-minute drive to the lively Phuket Old Town. After dark, head back to the resort to experience lively family-oriented shows, perfect for ending the day on a high.
offer_address: 96/66 Moo 3, Kamala Beach, Kathu, Kamala Phuket 83150 Thailand

title: Five-Star Phuket Beachfront Escape with All-Inclusive Drinks & Dining
description:
Soak up the sun and escape the crowds at the five-star Centara Grand Beach Resort Phuket - an award-winning paradise. A beachfront oasis neighbouring the beautiful sugar-fine sands of Karon Beach, this peaceful gem is just an hour's drive from Phuket International Airport.

Anyone yearning for an escape right on the white crescent beachfront will enjoy Centara Grand Beach Resort Phuket's elegant and spacious rooms, scattered among perfectly manicured gardens, and the glistening Andaman Sea vistas throughout the resort. This opulent resort - rated among the top 10% worldwide on Tripadvisor and stamped with a Travellers' Choice 2021 award - will exceed all expectations of paradise with its myriad of luxe facilities. Plunge into one of four swimming pools (including an adults-only pool), experience exceptional all-inclusive drinks and dining at a host of bars and restaurants, slip down the slides at the onsite waterpark and step out onto the secluded beachfront to sink your toes into a luxurious stretch of powder-white sands.

Whether travelling as a couple, with friends or family, Centara Grand Beach Resort Phuket welcomes you with its five-star facilities, pristine beachfront, fun kids' activities and tranquil spa.
offer_address: 683 Karon Beach, Patak Rd, Karon, Mueang Phuket District, Phuket 83100, Thailand

title: Adults-Only Kata Noi Beach Pool Villa with Daily Gourmet Dining
description: Experience pristine beachfront luxury at award-winning The Shore at Katathani, your adults-only pool villa sanctuary, beautifully nestled into the Phuket cliffside with stunning vistas over the luminous blue of Kata Noi, one of the island's most idyllic beaches. Be pampered with panoramic views over the luminous blue ocean from your villa's private infinity pool, daily breakfast for two, your choice of daily set menu three-course lunch or dinner, daily afternoon tea, a revitalising 60-minute massage per person and return airport transfers.
offer_address: 14 ถนน กะตะ Karon, Mueang Phuket District, Phuket 83100, Thailand

title: Phuket All-Inclusive Island Paradise with Massages, Free-Flow Drinks & Roundtrip Boat Transfers
description:
Immerse yourself in ultimate luxury at the tranquil Koh Maphrao, also known as Coconut Island, just off the mainland of Phuket. Here, you'll experience the epitome of island tranquility, where your toughest decision will be whether to indulge in a rejuvenating spa session or take a refreshing dip in the magnificent swimming pools. Island Escape by Burasari stands as an architecturally stunning sanctuary, seamlessly blending with its natural surroundings. Offering a glimpse of opulence amidst untouched beauty, this oasis boasts breathtaking views extending from the shimmering coastline to the lush mountains, evoking a sense of serene escapism. 

Indulge in a feast for the senses with each delectable meal thoughtfully provided, accompanied by a selection of free-flowing drinks to elevate your experience to new heights. When you're ready to explore, embark on an unforgettable journey to the lively night markets, bustling bars and sun-kissed beaches of mainland Phuket, all effortlessly accessible via the resort's complimentary boat shuttle service to Laem Hin Pier. Your unforgettable adventure commences and concludes with the convenience of inclusive roundtrip boat transfers to this tropical sanctuary.
offer_address: 94/4 Moo 6, Tambon Koh Kaew, Amphoe Muang, Phuket 83000, Thailand

vendor_name: Mandarava Resort and Spa, Karon Beach
title: Tranquil Phuket Paradise Overlooking Karon Beach with Five Infinity Pools, Daily Breakfast & Nightly Cocktail
description:
Experience the enchanting allure of this tranquil oasis, nestled amid the lush jungle setting of Karon Beach in Phuket. This Thai sanctuary, overlooking the azure Andaman Sea, is renowned for its wide array of amenities to delight every guest.

Boasting five mesmerising infinity pools, multiple swim-up bars and the rejuvenating Cheeva Spa - offering blissful treatments and a bubbly jacuzzi - the resort has all you need to curate the perfect tropical retreat. When you feel hungry, head to Chomtalay Restaurant to savour authentic Thai delicacies and soak up epic sunset vistas.

If you manage to tear yourself away from your resort, the local markets of Karon and the island's vibrant culinary scene and nightlife await.
offer_address: 14/2 Patak Road, Karon, Mueang Phuket District, Phuket 83000, Thailand

title: Tropical Phuket Escape Overlooking the Andaman Sea
description: Escape to the white sands and pristine waters of Phuket, staying at the Hyatt Place Phuket Patong, only steps away from the gorgeous Patong Beach. Stay in a room with your own private balcony and enjoy a two-course lunch and dinner, welcome cocktails, daily buffet breakfast, one-way airport transfer, guaranteed late checkout and more.
offer_address: 17/1-3 Soi Prabaramee 4, Prabaramee Road Patong, Kratoo 83150 Phuket Thailand

title: Stylish Phuket Island Hideaway with One-Way Airport Transfer & Daily Breakfast
description: Embrace Phuket's laidback island ambience at the family-friendly Radisson Resort & Suites Phuket -  a modern seaside hideaway just moments from the glittering Kamala Beach. Perfect for couples and families, this stunning property boasts spacious apartment-style suites, each offering floor-to-ceiling windows, convenient kitchenettes and balconies or terraces overlooking the shimmering resort pool or tropical gardens. Boasting three charming eateries, an onsite ice creamery, opulent resort pool, kids' club, lavish spa and more, there is no need to leave this vibrant resort. When you are ready to explore, find yourself a stone's throw away from beachfront restaurants, water sports and lively beach clubs.
offer_address: 100/10 Moo 3, Kamala, Kathu District, Phuket 83150, Thailand

title: Tropical Phuket Hideaway near Surin Beach with Six Pools, Daily Breakfast & Room Upgrade
description: Slip into relaxation while overlooking Surin Beach’s golden sands with a stay at Mida Grande Resort Phuket. The resort stretches across five acres, and the onsite facilities make it a perfect destination for couples and families alike. Enjoy modern dining at M Café and M-Eatery, dive into one of six saltwater pools (with four pools set on rooftops), sip your favourite drinks at one of three buzzing poolside bars or hit the sands at Bangtao and Surin Beach, both just a short 500-metre stroll away. The resort's location makes it easy to explore the island - head south to Patong’s buzzing bars, further inland to the mountain jungles to see the island's famed Big Buddha, or take a short jaunt north to Phuket Old Town’s pastel-hued shopfronts.
offer_address: 179/450 Had Surin Soi 4, Moo 3 Choengtalay, Thalang, Phuket, 83110, Thailand

title: Grand Reopening: Phuket Five-Star Beachside Escape with All-Inclusive Dining & Nightly Cocktails
description:
Be one of the first to savour sun-kissed moments spent on the golden shores of Karon Beach with a five-star stay at the brand-new Paradox Resort Phuket. Recently refurbished, this garden-filled luxury oasis - located just a 10-minute tuk-tuk ride from Patong’s buzzing restaurants, bars and nightlife - offers couples and families a Thailand escape that’s as relaxing or fun-filled as you choose. Enjoy local and international plates served poolside at Pacifica Restaurant, splash your way across multiple shimmering pools or head to MINT bar for sophisticated sips overlooking majestic seaside sunsets.

When you’re ready to explore, Phuket’s countless treasures await. Hang ten on Karon Beach’s acclaimed surf, explore Patong’s dazzling array of marketplaces, eateries and shopping boutiques or visit the island’s mighty Big Buddha, just a 15-minute drive away. Return to quiet moments spent in your tranquil tropical hideaway, surrounded on all sides by the island’s breathtaking natural beauty.
offer_address: 509 Patak Road, Karon Muang Phuket 83100 Thailand

title: Five-Star Hilltop Phuket Retreat with Daily Dining, Free-Flow Cocktail Hour & Massages
description:
If you’re dreaming of a private, tropical paradise, then The Pavilions Phuket could be just what you're looking for. The five-star resort is renowned for its gourmet dining experiences from romantic cuisine created specifically for you in your room, to a BBQ of the finest selection of seafood or succulent cuts of meat. Don't miss Firefly, a funky poolside restaurant and bar surrounded by a lush tropical garden with an open kitchen where you can watch your traditional Thai meal being created before your eyes.

Ranked in the top 10% of resorts worldwide with a Tripadvisor Travellers’ Choice 2021 award, The Pavilions Phuket is as much a place for those seeking some zen as it is for gourmands, with two tranquil swimming pools and a blissful day spa. Perched on one of Phuket's best vantage points you can fill your days in the ocean-facing gym, stretch on the yoga deck or pamper yourself with an out-of-this-world treatment at The Pavilions Spa. The resort is also located within easy reach of the beach, local markets, and an abundance of bars and restaurants. Wander down to the shore to board one of the many boats available for an island-hopping experience around Phuket's iconic limestone cliffs, or take the complimentary shuttle to Layan Beach.
offer_address: 31/1 หมู่ที่ 6 Tambon Choeng Thale, Amphoe Thalang, Chang Wat Phuket 83110, Thailand

title: Secluded Tropical Escape with Decadent Daily Dining & Cocktails
description:
Experience an idyllic escape on the Andaman Sea at SALA Phuket Resort and Spa. Escape the crowds at this spectacular resort, boasting an enviable location on one of Phuket’s most pristine beaches and a gorgeous collection of suites and private villas. Treat yourself with decadent inclusions: daily breakfast, nightly dinner, a nightly cocktail per person and private airport pick-up.

**Travelling as a family?** One child (aged 11 years and under) stays free with daily breakfast, nightly dinner and airport pick-up included.
location_description: SALA Phuket Resort and Spa May 20
offer_address: 333 Tambon Mai Khao, Amphoe Thalang, Chang Wat Phuket 83110, Thailand

title: Five-Star Phuket Retreat with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Cocktails
description: Treat yourself to a celebrity-style holiday at the five-star The Nai Harn Phuket, ranked in the top 20 resorts in Thailand at the 2019 Condé Nast Traveler Readers’ Choice Awards. One of Phuket’s most iconic destinations, this ultra-luxe resort is a beachfront sanctuary perfectly located steps away from the shores of Nai Harn Beach - a peaceful stretch of pristine sands away from the hustle of the tourist-laden areas on the island. Experience outstanding service and lavish facilities as you get pampered with daily breakfast, a three-course dining experience, a 60-minute massage, nightly cocktails at the chic rooftop bar and a one-way airport transfer.

title: Ultimate Beachfront Escape in Phuket’s Biggest Resort
description: Experience the ultimate flop and drop holiday at the iconic Hilton Phuket Arcadia Resort & Spa, ideally located opposite the famous Karon Beach and just a 10-minute tuk-tuk ride from vibrant Patong. Perfect for families and couples, the biggest resort in Phuket features five swimming pools, eight bars and restaurants, tennis and squash courts and much more. Enjoy a fuss-free holiday with an airport pick-up, daily buffet breakfast, nightly cocktails and a 10% discount on food and drinks, spa treatments and laundry during your stay. PLUS two kids aged 11 years and under stay, eat and play for free!
offer_address: 333 Patak Road, Karon Beach, Muang,, 83100 Karon Beach, Thailand

title: Phuket Family-Friendly Escape Moments from Kata Beach with Daily Breakfast & Cocktails
description:
If you love sand, sun and surf, OZO Phuket has you covered - this stylish family-friendly resort is only a breezy 150-metres from the pristine white sands and dazzling waters of Kata Beach. OZO Phuket specialises in good vibes and a laidback, generous style of hospitality that sets it apart. Colourful, fun-filled adventures await, with a vibrant onsite restaurant, poolside bar, hang out space and swimming pool. When you’re done soaking up the sun or exploring Phuket, each room is designed to maximise rest thanks to blackout curtains, soundproofing and unbelievably comfortable beds.

Kata Beach is considered one of Phuket’s very best, but there is an abundance of other highlights that make OZO Phuket the perfect base from which to explore the island. You’ll be a three-minute walk from Kata Night Market, a five-minute walk from Dino Park Mini Golf and a ten-minute drive from the stunning views of the Andaman Sea from atop Karon Viewpoint.
offer_address: 99 Kata Rd, Karon, Muang, Phuket 83100, Thailand

title: Experience One of Phuket’s Most Exclusive and Secluded Resorts with Indulgent Inclusions
description: Discover privacy, luxury and intimacy at the award-winning beachfront hideaway Trisara, home to the only Michelin-starred restaurant on the island. Set over a private bay in Phuket’s idyllic north-west coast, Trisara oozes secluded luxury, with each suite or villa boasting jaw-dropping ocean views and its own private pool. Enjoy a lavish escape in a private haven with daily breakfast, an exotic oceanfront Thai set dinner during your stay, a nightly sunset cocktail per person, one 60-minute massage for two and VIP return airport transfers.
offer_address: 60/1 Moo 6, Srisoonthorn Rd., Cherngtalay, Phuket

vendor_name: Mandarava Resort and Spa, Karon Beach
title: Top-Rated Phuket Paradise Overlooking Karon Beach with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Dinner & Cocktails
description:
Tranquility rolls in with the waves at Mandarava Resort and Spa - a Karon Beach sanctuary that's only moments from the action. Flaunting five infinity pools and three swim-up bars, nestled into Phuket's jungle setting, this charming haven perfectly merges Thailand's breathtaking natural surrounds with laidback luxury. Rated among the top three hotels in Phuket on Tripadvisor and stamped with a Travellers' Choice 2021 award, Mandarava Resort and Spa promises personalised service and complete relaxation.

Transcend bliss with a rejuvenating treatment or bubbly jacuzzi session at Cheeva Spa or watch the sunset with Thai cuisine at the resort's alfresco restaurant, Chomtalay. When you're ready to play, take the short stroll to picturesque Karon Beach or catch a 10-minute taxi to Patong and experience Thailand's iconic nightlife.
offer_address: 14/2 Patak Road, Karon, Mueang Phuket District, Phuket 83000, Thailand

vendor_name: Barcelo Coconut Island ( formerly The Village Coconut Island)
title: Multi-Million Dollar Renovation: Phuket All-Inclusive Island Escape with Return Transfers & Massages
description:
Castaway to Coconut Island and discover this multi-millon dollar renovated beachfront resort, where all-inclusive luxury reaches new heights. Perched on the white sands of Koh Maphrao, a hidden gem off Phuket’s east coast, this exclusive resort embodies the essence of island living while being just five minutes (on a complimentary water taxi) from the humming heart of Phuket.

Here, expect daily dining fit for the most discerning guests, elevated by free-flow drinks. Sit back and savour premium Thai and Asian cuisine at Kabang Restaurant’s beachfront location or share a wood-fired pizza amid Kucina Restaurant’s chandler-lit ambience. The recent renovation has introduced LAKU Beach Club; for a taste of coastal cool head to its adults-only pool, Mediterranean-inspired eatery or sports bar.

Stroll along the turquoise waters on the resort’s doorstep, spend hours by the infinity pool, sweat it out at the updated fitness centre or CrossFit studio, or leave your body in the hands of expert therapists at Kahtor Spa, featuring a hydrotherapy pool.

If you’re seeking a more active pace, jump onto a paddleboard, kayak or mountain bike to discover dazzling uncharted landscapes. Even after checkout, the luxury continues to the departure lounge, where you can shower and unwind in the utmost comfort before your adventure continues.
offer_address: 517 Moo 6 Kohkaew, Mueang Phuket District, Phuket 83000, Thailand

title: Phuket All-Inclusive Island Paradise with Massages, Free-Flow Drinks & Roundtrip Boat Transfers
description:
Surrender to all-inclusive indulgence at Island Escape by Burasari. Located on the beautifully secluded Koh Maphrao, or Coconut Island - and with complimentary, daily scheduled transfers to and from Phuket - here you can enjoy the best of island serenity, with the night markets, bars and beaches of Patong and the main island all on your doorstep. Included roundtrip boat transfers whisk you to this tropical paradise, where each sumptuous meal is taken care of, with free-flow drinks as the perfect finishing touch. The hardest decision you'll face is whether to stroll over to the opulent spa for some extra pampering or plunge into the fabulous swimming pools.

An architecturally exquisite oasis enhanced by its natural surroundings, Island Escape by Burasari brings a touch of luxury to this unspoilt islet. Incredible views stretch from the glistening beach to the mountainous hinterland, offering a feeling of faraway barefoot bliss - yet all within easy distance of Phuket, with scheduled transfers available.
offer_address: 94/4 Moo 6, Tambon Koh Kaew, Amphoe Muang, Phuket 83000, Thailand

title: Phuket Cliffside Private Pool Villa Decadence with Daily Dining, Nightly Cocktails & Massages
description:
Look over the pristine waters of Siray Bay from your cliffside perch, be hidden by the thick jungle of Ratsada and feel time slip away in your private pool at this all-villa paradise. Inspired by the bamboo curves of a fisherman village, Sinae Phuket Luxury Hotel offers boundless authenticity - surrender to the healing hands of wellness therapists at Sindh Spa, or borrow a good book from the library and sit poolside with a craft cocktail in hand. When it comes time to dine, savour fresh market produce at SAI Bistro, a restaurant moulded to mimic the longtail boats of southern Thailand, sip your favourite brew at the Hilltop cafe and watch the sunset dip below the Andaman Sea from SAI Lounge & Wine.

Located less than 20 minutes from Phuket Old Town, this area offers effortless exploration. Discover centuries-old Sino-Portuguese architecture, savour incredible street food, visit historical and spiritual landmarks, enjoy scenic walks and immerse yourself in learning at Phuket's heritage museums.
offer_address: 888 Moo 1, Koh Siray Ratsada, Mueang Phuket District, Phuket 83000, Thailand

title: Secluded Beachfront Bliss with All-Inclusive Gourmet Dining

Also included in your escape are daily cocktails, four 30-minute massages to share, a convenient one-way airport transfer and more.

Perched upon a serene clifftop between Kamala and Patong, this elevated Phuket pool villa retreat offers the perfect five-star beachfront base to discover the island’s best. Boasting just 90 suites and villas - each expansive, modern and designed to provide spectacular views over lush gardens or the Andaman Sea - and with the white sands of Patong Beach just a 10-minute ride away, this is your invitation to savour Thailand at its most breathtaking.

You’ll only be a 20-minute drive from many of the island’s best sights, including Phuket Old Town and always-happening Patong. Close enough to the action that you’ll never be inconvenienced but far enough to savour the serenity, it’s an unrivalled location only elevated by first-class views of Phuket’s legendary sunset.

Sip cocktails in style at The Meka Sky Lounge - surrounded by panoramic sea views - or spend your days lazing by the resort’s magnificent infinity pool. Easy access to the golden sands of Yae Beach - and an outstanding house reef - offer countless opportunities to savour your time in the sun.

description:
Experience the epitome of luxury at this five-star Phuket resort, perched on a cliff overlooking the tranquil waters of Kata Beach and the Andaman Sea. Designed to mimic a superyacht, this exclusive retreat offers private pool villas that blend seamlessly with the landscape, providing a sense of serene isolation. Indulge in oceanfront fine dining, innovative spa treatments and a 35-metre infinity pool that kisses the ocean's edge, where breathtaking sunsets paint the sky each evening. title: Award-Winning Group Getaway for Four on Unspoilt Mai Khao Beach

Fall in love with this magically secluded corner of southeast Phuket at this tranquil five-star tropical haven, a tropical retreat boasting luxurious private beach access. Cape Panwa Hotel is perfect for couples, families or groups of friends looking to reconnect in paradise. Enjoy the luxuries of mouth-watering all-inclusive dining at three of the restaurants, serving both international favourites and local Thai flavours. 

The only decision you will have to make each day is which of the two shimmering pools you will lounge by: the main pool is surrounded by cabanas, pool chairs and endless swaying palm trees, while the beachside pool offers spectacular views over the cool blue waters of the Andaman Sea - no matter which you choose, do it with a cocktail in hand.

Head to the blissful Cape Spa for a day of indulgent pampering with the included traditional Siamese Touch Massage to rejuvenate the mind, body and soul. Relax on the postcard-perfect private beach, seeking out your own slice of tropical paradise, take to the Andaman Sea for a snorkelling expedition through the unbelievably clear waters, or indulge in an array of cultural experiences.

Discover a dreamy paradise framed by verdant mountains and feel instantly soothed by the unhurried, laidback ambience of this opulent resort as you laze next to the stunning free-form pool or hop across the road onto the impressive sandy stretches of Karon Beach. Deepen your state of relaxation with a blissful treatment at the Pearl Spa, then explore the resort’s plethora of world-class restaurants and bars, including Portosino for local and international favourites, or The Dim Sun for impressive cocktails and rooftop views.

When you're ready to leave your secluded haven, a short 20-minute drive will place you at the Phuket Big Buddha, Wat Chalong or the lively street of Patong. Plus, for stunning Andaman Sea views, be sure to visit Karon Viewpoint.

For those seeking adventure, the resort is conveniently located just a 10-minute drive from the bustling Patong with its array of shopping and dining options. Spend sun-kissed days revelling in each other's company on your private terrace or stroll hand-in-hand along the Ocean Walk before sinking your toes into sweeping white sands lapped by impossibly blue waters. Indulge in treatments from an extensive menu at the impressive Ayurah Spa, plunge into the glittering outdoor infinity pools and indulge in sumptuous cuisine from the resort's 'wellness' based menus at The Edge and SEASONS restaurant.

Framed by the natural splendour of the nearby Phang Nga bay limestone karsts and resting on 10 kilometres of peaceful golden sands, only the lapping of the sea will disturb the serene silence of your stay. Tucked away along the sun-kissed shores of Phuket, just 300 metres from Kamala Beach, The Marin isn't your average beach resort - it's a true slice of paradise. With teakwood accents, sleek glass finishes and a lush rooftop garden and pool (the perfect place to enjoy free-flow cocktails), you can relax with a drink or a good book and enjoy the personal touch of staff who remember your name from day one.

Lounge by three immaculate pools shaded by coconut trees, sweat it out in the glass-walled fitness centre hovering above the jungle canopy, or head to the rooftop pool and sip cocktails without leaving the water. At Subsea, indulge in traditional Thai flavours and international favourites, in a laid-back yet elegant setting.

The Marin gives you breathing room from Phuket's party scene while keeping adventures within reach. Kayak through limestone caves at sunrise, helicopter to the Similan Islands by noon, spend a sunny afternoon at Café Del Mar beach club just down the road or let local guides lead you to Phuket's hidden night markets far from the usual tourist trail. Best of both worlds? Absolutely.

Spend the day sunning, swimming, and snorkelling around some of Thailand's most postcard-worthy destinations, including the beautiful coral reefs of Pi Leh Bay, the powdery white beaches of Bamboo Island, and the emerald waters of Maya Bay, immortalised by the movie, 'The Beach' starring Leonardo DiCaprio. You'll be picked up from your hotel and transported to this aquatic paradise where you can explore the underwater world teeming with colourful marine life, take in the spectacular sights, and enjoy a light beachside lunch. You'll leave in awe at the sights etched in your memory with a clear understanding why this stunning part of the world is so often frequented by travellers and locals alike.

Whether you’re a fan of fresh papaya salad, a fragrant green curry with melt-in-your-mouth chicken, silky coconut soup with prawns or a classic Pad Thai, you’ll be dealt the tools and skills to recreate these globally loved dishes at home.
