description:
Let waves of relaxation wash over you at the five-star, multi-award-winning Aleenta Phuket-Phang Nga Resort & Spa, less than a 30-minute drive from Phuket Airport. Indulge with treatments from an extensive menu at the award-winning Ayurah Spa, from the Harmonizing Body & Mind Massage to traditional Thai healing treatments, rejuvenating facials, manicures and pedicures. Sit back, relax and embrace Thai living at its most idyllic along the secluded shores of Natai Beach.

Framed by the natural splendour of the nearby Phang Nga limestone karsts and resting on 10 kilometres of peaceful golden sands, where jet skis, sun umbrellas and hawkers are banned, only the lapping of the sea will disturb the serene silence of your stay at this Leading Hotel of the World. The onsite wellness center, part of the Ayurah Wellness retreats, is a sanctuary of calm with rejuvenating treatments, a relaxation chamber, and a Vichy shower room for soothing water massages. Guests can enjoy complimentary wellness classes along with personalised exercise programs led by trainers.
offer_address: 33 Moo 5, Khok Kloi, Takua Thung, Phang Nga, 82140 Thailand

title: Five-Star Island Escape near Phuket with Daily Breakfast & Cocktails
description:
Sparkling off the eastern shores of Phuket, Koh Maphrao is a beautifully secluded paradise crowned by the brand-new Island Escape by Burasari - an architecturally exquisite haven empowered by its natural surrounds, bringing a touch of supreme luxury to this unspoilt islet. Featuring an opulent collection of sleek rooms and private pool villas, and equally spectacular facilities, Island Escape by Burasari leaves you wanting for nothing. Swing above the adults-only lagoon in an overwater hammock, stroll over to the indulgent spa for some extra pampering or plunge into the fabulous swimming pool, complete with waterslide and floating sundecks. Kids can zipline and rock climb through an adventure-filled Treasure Island-inspired playground, while adults can share sunset cocktails at the beachfront restaurant or treetop bar.

Claiming a pristine corner of the sugar-white coast, this boutique retreat is surrounded by a soul-stirring beauty that stretches from the glistening beach to the mountainous hinterland - offering a feeling of faraway barefoot bliss within easy distance of Phuket.

**Luxury Escapes inclusions (select nights):**

- Wake up in island paradise with a delicious **daily beachfront breakfast**
- Travel to the island with ease with **roundtrip boat transfers**
- Celebrate your escape with a **daily hand-crafted cocktail** per adult
- Indulge in a one-time **three-course dinner** (for stays of 3+ nights)
- Unwind with a one-time **30-minute massage** per person (for stays of 5+ nights)
- Treat yourself with **THB1,000 resort credit** per package (for stays of 7+ nights)

**Travelling with family or friends?** Upgrade to a Two-Bedroom Villa (for up to four guests), a Three-Bedroom Villa (for up to six guests) or a Four-Bedroom Villa (for up to eight guests).

**Looking for added luxury?** Upgrade to a Pool Villa and enjoy the added luxury of a private pool, or choose an Ocean-View Pool Villa (two, three or four-bedroom) and gaze out on sweeping sea vistas from your spacious sundeck.
offer_address: 94/4 Moo 6, Tambon, Ko Kaeo, Amphur Muang, Phuket 83000, Thailand

title: Idyllic Phuket Escape near Old Town with Spa & Rooftop Pool
description:
Nestled in the heart of Phuket, this modern retreat places you just moments from the city's Sino-Portuguese quarter and local markets. Complete with a stylish sky lounge, pool and bar, the hotel's rooftop hangout is the perfect spot to enjoy tropical cocktails, delicious bites and relaxing swims paired with panoramic city vistas.

For a taste of local culture, visit the revered Wat Chalong, the largest Buddhist temple in Phuket, or explore the Phuket Elephant Sanctuary for special encounters with these gentle giants. Back at the hotel, unwind with a traditional Thai massage at the spa and indulge in all-day dining at the onsite Amor restaurant.
offer_address: 40 Chanajaroen Road, Tambol Talad Yai, Amphur Muang, Phuket 83000, Thailand

title: Phuket Beachside Suite Hideaway near Bang Tao Beach
description: Surrounded by lush tropical jungle and just minutes from the impossibly blue seas of the Bang Tao Bay is the boutique Angsana Villas Resort Phuket, the perfect secluded escape for those looking to savour sun, sand and sea. An exclusive haven within the larger Laguna Phuket Integrated Resort, you'll fall in love with the resort’s masterfully appointed private villas and suites, designed with ultimate comfort in mind. You'll never want to leave - and with Angsana Villas Resort Phuket’s multitude of entertainment and dining options, you won’t have to. Embark on a culinary journey across the resort’s nine restaurants and bars, including the Italian-focused Azura Restaurant and traditional Thai restaurant Baan Talay, or simply swing the morning away across the emerald greens of the world-class Laguna Golf Phuket. Parents will appreciate the resort's supervised Kids' Club, while those looking to relax will cherish the services of the dreamy onsite Angsana Spa and the resort's pristine beaches.
offer_address: 142/3 Moo 6, Cherngtalay, Talang, Phuket 83110, Thailand

title: Mövenpick Phuket Island Indulgence near Patong Beach with Onsite Spa & Kids' Club
description:
If you’re dreaming of a tropical paradise, this is the place for you - offering relaxation for those who want to unwind and gourmet delights for food enthusiasts. Fill your days lounging beside the palm-fringed swimming pool, rejuvenating body and soul in the fitness centre or pampering yourself with an out-of-this-world treatment at A VIDA Spa.

The peace within the resort's enclave makes you feel tucked away, but you're only a short walk from bustling Bangla Road and the popular shores of Patong Beach. This indulgent oasis is renowned for its gourmet dining, don't miss the creative cocktails at Azure Pool Bar or the Thai, Sino-Portuguese and Western dishes served at Atrio Restaurant in a striking setting.
offer_address: 27/9 Rat-U-Thit 200 Pee Road, Kathu District, Phuket 83150, Thailand

title: Luxury Phuket Island Paradise overlooking Andaman Sea with Five Restaurants
description: Powdery sands and rolling verdant hills collide with sophisticated beachside accommodation at the ultra-luxurious Anantara Layan Phuket Resort and Layan Residences by Anantara, along with an unmissable view of the majestic Andaman Sea. Take in the gilded surroundings with hints of traditional Thai design before diving into the expansive opportunities the resort has to offer. Cast a line into the ocean on your doorstep, master Muay Thai with a professional trainer, or taste vintage wines paired with stunning cuisine and knowledge from the resort’s own wine gurus (own expense). Phuket itself is filled with vibrant adventures waiting for you, from bustling markets to mind-blowing street food and historic temples. After your rejuvenating vacation, glide off into the clouds with the island's only luxury helicopter charter - a wondrous experience from start to finish (own expense).
location_description: Anantara Layan Phuket Resort and Layan Residences by Anantara
offer_address: 168 Moo 6, Layan Beach Soi 4, Cherngtalay, Thalang, Phuket 83110, Thailand

title: Five-Star Oceanfront Phuket Escape with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Cocktails
description:
Find solace in a magically secluded corner of southeast Phuket at the tranquil five-star Cape Panwa Hotel, a luxury tropical retreat in a prime beachfront location. Leonardo DiCaprio, Catherine Zeta-Jones and Elizabeth Taylor have all called this stunning colonial-style mansion their home away from home - now it’s your turn to travel like Hollywood royalty.

As one of the first luxury establishments in the area, the resort boasts a long list of world-class facilities and outstanding service. Take your pick of two pools to lounge by as you soak up the hot Thai sun: the main pool is surrounded by cabanas, pool chairs and endless swaying palm trees, while the beachside pool offers spectacular views over the blue waters of the Andaman Sea. When you're ready to sink into ultimate relaxation, head to the blissful Cape Spa Phuket to indulge or enjoy other luxury facilities, such as a private beach, fitness centre and an array of cultural experiences hosted within the resort. When you're ready to leave the hotel's postcard-perfect beach, go on a half-day tour of Coral Island, also known as Ko He, boasting bright-blue waters and pristine beaches; the perfect place for a snorkel.

**Luxury Escapes inclusions (select nights):**

- Start each morning with delicious **daily breakfast**
- Watch the sun go down with a **nightly cocktail, beer, glass of wine or soft drink** per person
- Enjoy one delicious **three-course Thai set dinner** (for stays of 3+ nights)
- Relax with a **60-minute massage per adult** (for stays of 5+ nights)
- Indulge further with **THB4,200 resort credit** per package (for stays of 7+ nights)

**Travelling with friends or family?** Upgrade to the Family Suite package for up to two adults and two kids (11 and under) or the three-bedroom Panwa Lodge with private pool for up to six adults.
offer_address: 27, 27/2, Mu 8 Sakdidej Road, Cape Panwa, Phuket 83000, Thailand

title: Five-Star Phuket Movenpick Escape Steps from Bangtao Beach with Four Restaurants & Bars
description:
Indulge in beachfront luxury at this Mövenpick jewel in Phuket, offering easy access to the pristine sands of Bangtao Beach. Blending the best of classic Thai and contemporary design, this family-friendly retreat is home to rooms, residences and penthouses that deliver contemporary luxury at its best. 

Five-star facilities more than match the accommodation - savour authentic Thai cuisine at The Palm Cuisine and Terrace, or satiate your sweet tooth at the daily Chocolate Hour, a hallmark of Movenpick resorts around the world. While the little ones are at the kids' club, soak away the day at Blossom Spa, relax in a cabana by the oceanfront pool or walk along the powder-white sands of Bangtao. Venture beyond the hotel to explore Cherng Talay, a local village with upmarket restaurants and historic temples.
offer_address: 35 Moo 4 Cherngtalay Thalang, Phuket 83110, Thailand

title: Stylish Phuket Escape near Bangla Road With Rooftop Bar & Infinity Pool
description: Embrace tuk tuks and tikis in tropical paradise with a stay at Hotel Indigo Phuket Patong, an IHG Hotel, located just a short walk from Bangla Road’s famously electrifying nightlife. Enjoy locally-sourced plates grilled to perfection at Butcher’s Garden restaurant, soul-stirring views high above Patong at the hotel’s rooftop bar and mirage-like infinity pool, thrilling muay thai bouts at the onsite ring or tropical sips at Pots, Pints & Tikis, serving up craft beers and handmade cocktails.
location_description: Hotel Indigo Phuket Patong, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Rat U Thit 200 Pee Rd Pa Tong, Phuket 83150, Thailand

title: Award-Winning Phuket Private Pool Villa Retreat
description: Experience pristine beachfront luxury at the award-winning, five-star The Shore at Katathani - a private pool sanctuary hidden in the Phuket cliffside, with stunning vistas over Kata Noi Beach. Spend sun-kissed days on your private terrace or stroll hand-in-hand along The Ocean Walk and sink your toes into white sands. Indulge in a couples' massage at the luxurious Serenity Spa, or share in a special moment watching the sun shimmer across the Andaman at The Nest Beach Club.
offer_address: 18 Kata Noi Road, Muang 83100, Phuket, Thailand

title: Phuket Escape near Patong Beach & Bang La Road with Three-Tier Pool
description: Discover blissful serenity at this Phuket resort moments from the beach, offering an unbeatable position in vibrant Patong. With unrivalled ocean views, first-class facilities - including a spectacular three-tiered pool - and easy access to Patong Beach and the legendary entertainment district Bang La Road, you’ll be all set to savour time spent in paradise. Take your stay to the next level with a visit to Le Spa, offering traditional massages and holistic therapies designed to rejuvenate and revitalise.
offer_address: 282 Phrabaramee Road, Patong Kathu, Phuket 83150, Thailand

title: Luxury Phuket Resort Minutes from Surin Beach
description:
Discover your own tropical oasis at The Chava Resort, a luxurious retreat ranked within the top 10% of properties on Tripadvisor, less than a five-minute stroll from the golden sandy shores of Surin Beach.

Spend your days lounging on the beach, take part in a cooking class, peruse the local markets, or take a trip out to Phang Nga Bay to see the incredible limestone karsts that jut from the emerald waters. Back at the resort, step inside the grand palatial lobby and admire the modern luxury with flourishes of traditional Thai design which flows through the entire resort. Take a dip in the glorious swimming pool, dine alfresco at the restaurant nestled in the tropical gardens, and indulge in a rejuvenating Thai massage from the privacy of your room.
offer_address: Soi Hat Surin 8, Choeng Thale, Thalang District, Phuket 83110, Thailand

title: Award-Winning Phuket Escape with Three Lagoon Pools, Thai Designs & Luxury Spa
description:
Escape to this pristine hideaway just steps from Patong's beautiful beach and the busy night markets of Phuket. Dive into the hotel's three lagoon-style pools, relish authentic Thai cuisine at Bubbles Restaurant, or indulge in traditional treatments at Ryn Spa. Learn a new skill with Thai cooking classes with master chefs (extra charges apply) or burn some calories at the state-of-the-art fitness centre.

Venture out to the nearby Jungceylon Shopping Centre for a shop-till-you-drop experience, or take a short drive to the stunning viewpoints at Karon Beach and be mesmerised by the beauty of this beach lovers' destination. Indulge in Thai hospitality and luxury at its best at this beautiful residence in a tropical paradise.
offer_address: 1 Soi Rat U Thit 200 Pi 2, Patong, Kathu, Phuket 83150, Thailand

vendor_name: Holiday Inn Express Phuket Patong Bch Central
title: Stylish Phuket Escape Minutes from Patong Beach
description: Between bustling beaches and bubbly entertainment strips, there is the Holiday Inn Express Phuket Patong Beach Central, an IHG Hotel, offering ultra-stylish suites and tasty treats all at one laidback address. Take lunch by the pool and soak up the sun or head to the lively Patong Beach where cafes and bars overflow onto the shore for limitless fun. Refuel at The Great Room with a tasty snack and coffee or chill out in the serene wood-trimmed Lobby Bar with an ice-cold beer.
location_description: Holiday Inn Express Phuket Patong Beach Central
offer_address: 8 Hatpatong, Phuket, 83150 Thailand

title: Phuket Beachfront Escape with Onsite Waterpark, Four Swimming Pools & Spa
description:
Soak up the sun and escape the crowds at this paradise on the beautiful sugar-fine sands of Karon Beach. Anyone yearning for an escape will enjoy this peaceful gem - elegant and spacious rooms are scattered among perfectly manicured gardens, with glistening Andaman Sea vistas throughout the resort.

Completing the postcard-perfect picture is a plethora of luxe facilities: plunge into one of four swimming pools (including an adults-only pool), have a splash at the onsite waterpark, indulge in exceptional drinks and dining at a host of bars and restaurants, and step out onto the secluded beachfront and sink into the warm, shimmering waters.
offer_address: 683 Karon Beach, Patak Road, Karon, Muang, Phuket 83100, Thailand

title: Five-Star Hilltop Phuket Retreat with Award-Winning Restaurants & Wellness Centre
description:
The ideal hideaway for those looking for privacy and intimacy, The Pavilions Phuket is dramatically perched atop one of Phuket's best vantage points and boasts serene ocean and mountain vistas across the northwest coast. Ranked within the top 10% of properties on Tripadvisor, this five-star property is the tropical paradise you have been dreaming of. 

Inside you'll find Firefly, a funky poolside restaurant and bar surrounded by lush tropical garden where you can take a seat in front of the open kitchen and watch your traditional Thai meal being created before your eyes. Take a dip in one of the resort’s two swimming pools, stretch on the yoga deck and pamper yourself with an out-of-this-world treatment at The Pavilions Spa.
offer_address: 31/1 หมู่ที่ 6 Tambon Choeng Thale, Amphoe Thalang, Chang Wat Phuket 83110, Thailand

title: Luxe Five-Star Phuket Retreat Overlooking Phang Nga Bay with Daily Breakfast & Cocktails
description:
Celebrate an escape from the everyday in a magically secluded corner of Phuket: discover COMO Point Yamu, a luxury clifftop retreat brimming with five-star indulgence and 360-degree vistas of the UNESCO-protected Phang Nga Bay. Admire breathtaking panoramas in this secluded pocket of paradise, away from Phuket’s bustling city centre.

From the moment you arrive at this luxurious, five-star resort, feel all your troubles melt away. From the breathtaking panoramic views enjoyed from all rooms and suites to holistic spa treatments and sunrise yoga, the luxurious amenities of COMO Point Yamu are sure to leave you feeling out-of-this-world relaxed. Featuring a gorgeous 100-metre infinity pool, yoga studio, two world-class restaurants, a steamy sauna and blissful spa treatment rooms, this luxurious resort is an island oasis catering to your every need.

**Luxury Escapes inclusions (select nights):**

- Wake up to delicious **daily buffet breakfast**
- Enjoy one refreshing **daily cocktail** per adult
- Take your time in paradise with **2pm late checkout**
- Make the most of a **10% discount on food and drinks**
- Savour a one-time **three-course set dinner for two** (for stays of 3+ nights)
- Relax with a **30-minute massage** per guest, per stay (for stays of 5+ nights)
- An **additional one-time three-course set dinner** for two (two total, for stays of 7+ nights)

**Pool Villa Upgrade available:** Plunge into your own private pool when you choose a One or Two-Bedroom Pool Villa.

**Travelling with family?** Choose the Two-Bedroom Pool Villa for four. Plus, up to two children (11 and under) stay free with breakfast.
offer_address: 225 Moo 7, Talang, Paklok, Phuket 83110, Thailand

title: Secluded Five-Star Phuket Escape with Three Beachfront Swimming Pools
description:
Tranquillity takes on a new definition at SALA Phuket Resort and Spa. Nestled in the unspoilt northwest corner of Phuket, this five-star resort sits on the pristine shores of the island’s longest beach, where palm trees sway and white sand begs to be disturbed. Shuttle buses take you to the street-food markets of Phuket Old Town and lively bars of Patong should you wish to visit, but with 22sqkm of the coastal Sirinat National Park to explore, you can build your own Thai adventure.

SALA Phuket is a masterclass in understated elegance and indulgence, with suites and villas that subtly whisper romance through open-air bathrooms and oversized beds you’ll want to sink into. Water-lovers will be spoilt for choice, with three beachfront pools and a collection of pool villas, all just a bucket-throw away from the glittering waters of the Andaman Sea. Spend your days snorkelling, boating or kayaking around the islands of Phang Nga Bay, before retiring to the award-winning spa for a revitalising treatment, or finding your zen with a yoga class on the beachfront. You’ll want to work up an appetite - the food is world-class, starting with pastries and eggs for breakfast, through to Thai favourites and Asian-Med delicacies for dinner. Soak it all in at the open-air SALA restaurant or opt for room service - it’s available until 10pm daily.
offer_address: 333 Tambon Mai Khao, Amphoe Thalang, Chang Wat Phuket 83110 Thailand

title: Secluded Phuket Villa Escape near Patong with Onsite Dining, Day Spa & Beachfront Infinity Pool
description:
Perched on the edge of the Andaman Sea, retreat to this architectural resort, superbly placed on a verdant hilltop between Kamala Bay and Patong Beach. Immerse yourself in tropical island bliss within design-led suites and villas, offering lush garden or sea views, and Phuket's longest beachfront infinity pool.

Soak up panoramic ocean vistas while you sip on refreshing cocktails at The Meka Sky Lounge and dine on exquisite Thai delicacies at The Wiwa restaurant. With easy access to the powder-soft sands of Yae Beach, snorkel around in the local reef or venture out to explore the vibrant nightlife of Patong and Phuket Old Town, situated only 15 minutes away.
offer_address: 1/18, 1/20 Moo 6 Kamala, Kathu, Phuket 83150, Thailand

title: Tranquil Novotel Phuket Beachfront Escape on Kamala Bay with Outdoor Pool & Rooftop Bar
description:
Endless sea views, lush tropical foliage, powder-white sands and trademark Novotel luxury converge at this sprawling beachfront oasis on Thailand's largest island, Phuket. Tucked away on the quiet cerulean shores of Kamala Bay, the resort boasts exquisitely designed rooms, suites and villas and offers the perfect slice of tropical paradise.

Spend your days soaking up the sun, swimming laps in the sparkling outdoor pool and sipping on refreshing tiki cocktails from the swim-up pool bar, Lilo. When hunger strikes, savour authentic Thai dishes at Soul Kitchen, catch live sporting action from The Living Room sports bar and enjoy epic sunsets from On the Roof rooftop bar. If you wish to explore, the vibrant nightlife of Patong and Old Phuket Town is only a short drive away.
offer_address: 118/16 Moo 3 Tambon Kamala, Amphur Kathu, Phuket 83150, Thailand

title: Secluded Five-Star Phuket Wellness Retreat Overlooking the Andaman Sea
description:
Swathe yourself in unparalleled relaxation and sweeping Andaman vistas at Amatara Welleisure™ Resort, a five-star retreat gracing the turquoise shores of Phuket's Cape Panwa. Promising a complete mind and body metamorphosis through an exceptional program of wellness activities and workshops, this secluded oasis is imbued with a tranquil ambience designed to leave you feeling inspired by the benefits of healthy living.

Whether you want to align your chakras or your posture, increase your heart rate or slow it right down, Amatara Welleisure™ Resort has thought of everything - from its state-of-the-art pilates studio to its holistic in-house physiotherapists. Let off some steam in the Thai hammam, cleanse away the cocktails with a pampering spa treatment or make friends in a group fitness class. Take up a new hobby or fine-tune existing skills with expert instructors on hand to teach anything from Muay Thai to traditional yoga, or boost your energy with a friendly volleyball match on the resort's stretch of private beach. When it's time to wind down, indulge in fresh and hearty cuisine across the resort's three impressive restaurants, catch some rays on the romantic roof terrace or cool off in the gorgeous lagoon pool overlooking the bay.
offer_address: 84, Moo 8, Sakdidej Road Vichit Muang Phuket 83000, Thailand

vendor_name: Cape Sienna Phuket Gourmet Hotel & Villas
title: Stylish Oceanfront Phuket Retreat
description:
Escape to Phuket’s high-end Millionaire’s Mile and indulge in a postcard-perfect break at Cape Sienna Phuket Gourmet Hotel & Villas, a cosmopolitan resort perched on the clifftops overlooking serene Kamala Bay. With picturesque uninterrupted sea views from almost every corner, this tranquil haven dials up the romance, offering pure indulgence with a side of beachside bliss.

Every room or suite has a front-row seat to the Andaman Sea, but it’s at the restaurants and bars that the serene setting comes into its own. Peel your eyes away from the floor-to-ceiling windows at the ultra-romantic Plum to focus on the charcoal oven, where prime cuts of beef and fresh seafood are expertly prepared, or venture to Vanilla Sky Bar for cocktails on the ocean-view terrace. Switch between lazing in the infinity pool and sipping on cocktails at the open-air Sienna Rocks Café, or slip into the resort's second pool, 30 metres long and lined with palm-fringed cabanas and a poolside restaurant. Restore mind and body with a traditional Thai massage or deep-cleansing facial at Balance Spa or, if you’ve got extra energy to burn, rally on the rooftop tennis court and get your blood pumping in the stylish gym.
location_description: Cape Sienna Phuket Gourmet Hotel & Villas
offer_address: 18/40 Moo 6, Layi-Nakalay Road, Kamala, Kathu District, Phuket 83150, Thailand

title: Multi-Award-Winning Five-Star Phuket Retreat with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Rooftop Cocktails
description:
Experience Phuket like never before from the glamorous, five-star Nai Harn, ranked #1 resort in Nai Harn on Tripadvisor, #2 in Thailand at the Condé Nast Traveler Readers’ Choice Awards, and the only Leading Hotels of the World member on the entire island.

Offering unbeatable views over the island’s best beach - a peaceful stretch of pristine sands away from the hustle and bustle - together with outstanding facilities and five-star service, this ultra-luxe oasis is an oceanfront sanctuary surrounded by lush rainforest and crystal-clear waters. Pamper yourself at the spa, drink and dine across five onsite bars and restaurants, and make the most of unique luxury touches such as beach butler service and private terrace barbecues.
offer_address: 23/3 Moo1, Vises Road, Rawai, Muang District, Phuket 83130, Thailand

title: Five-Star Phuket Pool Villas with Private Beach & Five Onsite Restaurants
description: Hidden among lush jungles and secluded sands, the five-star Anantara Mai Khao Phuket Villas stands as the ultimate romantic escape. This serene oasis boasts 83 pool villas, each clustered around a lotus-filled central lagoon, effortlessly combining cutting-edge luxury with Southern Thai style. You’ll fall in love with the resort’s dazzling array of first-class facilities - relish treehouse omakase on top of an ancient banyan tree, revitalise with ayurvedic wellness treatments at Anantara Spa or savour cocktails as you watch the sun fall spectacularly beneath the shimmering Andaman Sea. Whatever you decide, you'll be surrounded by the resort's soul-stirring beauty and top-notch service.
offer_address: 888 Moo 3, Tumbon Mai Khao, Amphur Thalang, Phuket 83110

title: Ultra-Stylish Beachside Phuket Hideaway with Three Pools & Acclaimed Fine Dining
description: Experience the perfect blend of contemporary design and natural splendour at this incredibly stylish sanctuary, just steps from the shimmering sands of Nai Yang Beach. As you wander the tropical garden paths you’ll notice the nod to the island's tin-mining history with charming sculptures throughout. Black Ginger is a place where traditional dishes and modern dining combine, while the retro-inspired Tongkah Tin Syndicate offers refreshing cocktails following an afternoon swim.
offer_address: 116, Moo 1, Sakhu Thalang Phuket 83110, Thailand

vendor_name: Holiday Inn Resort Phuket Surin Beach, An Ihg Hotel
title: Phuket Family-Friendly Seaside Paradise with Two Pools & Three Dining Venues
description:
Spoil your crew with a trip to one of Phuket's best family resorts. This expansive complex is just a moment's walk from the powder-fine shores of Surin Beach and offers everything a young family could wish for within its grounds.

Here, your little adventurers can dive into their own fun-filled world - whether it's zipping down the waterslides, battling it out in the arcade, kicking back with a movie in the kids' club or swimming across two sparkling pools. Plus, three eateries are on hand for delicious Thai dishes, international favourites and even an onsite ice-cream shop to cool off after days on the sand.
location_description: Holiday Inn Resort Phuket Surin Beach, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 106/27 Moo 3, Cherngtalay, Talang, Surin Beach, Phuket 83110, Thailand

title: Tropical Phuket Escape near Patong Beach with Pool Bar & Onsite Spa
description:
It's time to indulge in the tropical allure of Phuket with a stay at at this expansive resort, perfectly positioned in the vibrant Patong district. From authentic Thai cuisine at the hotel's Square Restaurant to refreshing drinks at the Velvet Pool Bar, your culinary experiences are carefully curated under one roof. For a stress-free escape, enjoy rejuvenating treatments and massages at the In Balance Spa and for the little ones, there's a dedicated kids' club to keep them entertained.

This family-friendly retreat also offers easy access to the glittering Andaman Sea and the bustling Bangla Road, renowned for its vibrant nightlife. It is just steps away from the dreamy Patong Beach, making it the ideal choice for beach babies. Among other popular spots nearby are the Jungceylon shopping mall, the Simon Cabaret and Phuket Fantasea.
offer_address: 89 Rat U Thit, 200 Pee Road, Patong Beach, Kathu, Phuket 83150, Thailand

title: Phuket Oceanfront Luxury with Six Pools, Six Dining Venues & Daily Breakfast
description: Experience a coastal oasis set along the edge of the sparkling Kata Noi Beach with a relaxing stay at one of the area's finest resorts - Katathani Phuket Beach Resort. You'll never want to leave this stunning paradise - with six restaurants and bars, six pools and plenty of fun for kids, too. Wander along the beautiful beach which extends from your accommodation, sip on a handcrafted cocktail or discover head-to-toe rejuvenation at Tew Son Spa.
offer_address: 14 Kata Noi Road, Karon, Phuket 83100, Thailand

title: Pullman Phuket Beachfront Escape with Infinity Pool, Onsite Spa & Four Restaurants & Bars
description:
Treat yourself to a five-star tropical oasis nestled in a secluded location on the southeastern tip of Phuket. Overlooking picturesque Makham Bay and the sparkling Andaman Sea, this tropical haven is the perfect haven for a flop-and-drop vacation.

Spend your days tasting the flavours of Thailand at Tamarind restaurant, sipping coffee at The Junction lounge, or devouring cocktails and club sandwiches at the poolside Edge Beach Club. Should you be in search of a little action, take advantage of the watersports and marine activities on offer, or explore Phuket's technicolour Old Town - just a short 20-minute drive away.
offer_address: 44/5 Moo 8 Sakdidesh Road, Vichit, Muang, Phuket 83000, Thailand

title: Five-Star Phuket Hideaway with Luxury Villas Near Bang Tao Beach
description:
For an escape from reality, stay at the luxurious Banyan Tree Phuket nestled on the fringes of Bang Tao Beach and ranked within the top 10% of properties on Tripadvisor. This private paradise is the perfect spot to unwind: tee off on the 18-hole golf course, take a refreshing dip in the outdoor swimming pool, and be lulled into total relaxation at Banyan Tree Spa with a traditional spa treatment using local remedies.

For gourmands, there's no shortage of mouthwatering food options onsite with four dining venues offering everything from authentic Thai cuisine and fresh seafood to plant-based specialties. Banyan Tree Phuket sits on 89 acres including tennis courts, cycling paths, and lakes and canals perfect for watersports. Meanwhile, the golden shores of Bang Tao Beach, one of the most picturesque beaches on the island, are around a 10-minute walk away. When you’re feeling adventurous, venture further into the centre of town, where bustling night markets, shops, restaurants and bars are a 30-minute drive away.
offer_address: 33 33/27 Moo 4, Srisoonthorn Road, Thalang District, Phuket 83110, Thailand

vendor_name: Holiday Inn Resort Phuket Karon Beach
title: Phuket Paradise near Karon Beach with Three Onsite Restaurants
description: Dive into Thailand’s turquoise waters and breathtaking beaches with a stay at Holiday Inn Resort Phuket, an IHG Hotel. Unwind as you lounge by the glistening swimming pool, or head to the beach for a refreshing splash in the tropical tides. Finish each day with a delicious meal at one of the three onsite restaurants, then embrace tradition with a contemporary touch during one of the resort’s rejuvenating spa treatments.
location_description: Holiday Inn Resort Phuket Karon Beach, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 568 Patak Road, Tambol, Karon, Amphur Mueang, Phuket 83100, Thailand

title: Fun-Filled Phuket Escape on Bang Tao Beach
description:
Experience the ultimate fun-filled escape at Angsana Laguna Phuket, perfectly set on the shores of Bang Tao Beach, surrounded by a glittering lagoon with an endless supply of exciting activities on offer. Dive into the 300-metre swimming pool, go paddleboarding across the lagoon and order cocktails for your cabana at the ritzy swim-up bar and lounge at XANA Beach Club. Drop the little ones off at Angsana Kids’ Club for a day filled with treasure hunts, face painting and cooking classes, while you treat yourself to a traditional Thai massage at the luxe Angsana Spa.

The resort is part of a wider complex, where you can tee off at an award-winning 18-hole golf course, dine in an abundance of restaurants and explore stunningly manicured landscapes. Daily shuttle services operate every 30 minutes from the resort and zip across the complex, making exploration easy. A few kilometres away, you can indulge in shopping at the open-air malls, Porto de Phuket or Boat Avenue, which has a weekly night market.
offer_address: 10 Moo 4, Srisoonthorn Road Cherngtalay, Thalang District, Phuket 83110, Thailand

vendor_name: Pullman Phuket Arcadia Karon Beach Resort
title: Phuket Beachside Paradise with Eight Dining Venues, Five Pools & Onsite Spa
description:
Enjoy the charms of Phuket with a luxurious stay at this tropical oasis, located just a stone's throw from the shimmering Andaman Sea and the lively Karon Beach.

After days spent exploring the bustling Karon Market or dining at any of eight onsite eateries, from casual bites and beers to fine set-menu dining, retreat to the resort's tranquil spa or take a dip in one of five lagoon-style pools. The hotel also offers a dedicated kids' club, making it an ideal choice for families.
offer_address: 333 Patak Road, Karon Beach, Muang Phuket, Phuket 83100, Thailand

title: Phuket Jungle-Themed Family Resort with Water Slides, Restaurant & Two Bars
description: Retreat to the long-lost world of Pamookkoo! This family-friendly, ancient civilisation-themed resort is a stone's throw from the golden sands of Kata Beach and a short drive from the bustling Patong Beach. When you're not exploring the island's diverse culinary scene, plunge into the resort's expansive water park, dine on authentic Thai cuisine at the onsite restaurant, or make a splash in the Adventure Pool. The resort also offers two cocktail bars and a fun-filled kids' club.
offer_address: 70/1 Kata Rd, Karon, Mueang Phuket District, Phuket 83100, Thailand

vendor_name: Avista Grande Phuket Karon, MGallery by Sofitel
title: Relaxing Phuket Resort Near Karon Beach with Swim-Up Bar & Onsite Day Spa
description:
Experience the enchanting allure of Thailand at this expansive resort which woos you with its old-world charm and modern-day luxuries. This five-star sanctuary is a stone's throw from the golden sands of Karon Beach and the vibrant local markets. Treat your palate to authentic Sino-Portuguese and Thai flavours at Portosino or indulge in a cocktail at the rooftop bar, Dim Sun, offering panoramic sea views.

A sparkling pool with a cascading waterfall invites you for the most refreshing swim and a spa, awarded for its exclusive and traditional Thai massages will leave you stress-free to enjoy the best of Phuket.
location_description: Avista Grande Karon Resort & Spa - MGallery Phuket
offer_address: 38 Soi Luang Phor Chuan Soi 1, Karon District, Amphur Muang, 83100 Phuket Province, Thailand

title: Award-Winning Phuket Pool Villas with Top-Rated Wellness Spa
description: Draped in Phuket's lush rainforest and overlooking the Andaman Sea, Keemala is an architectural wonder expertly crafted for honeymooners, romantics and those seeking a truly unique stay. Take your Thailand escape to new levels with private pools and verdant views from every villa, an immersive and sustainable approach to fine dining at Mala Restaurant, Mala Bar and Cha-La Pool Bar, and total tranquility on offer at Mala Spa, where the best of modern pampering regimes heal the body and invigorate the mind.
offer_address: 10/88 Moo 6, Nakasud Road, Kamala, Kathu, Phuket, 83150, Thailand

title: Five-Star Phuket Oceanfront Retreat with Michelin-Star Restaurant & World-Class Spa
description:
Discover heaven on Earth at Trisara, a world-class haven of opulent private villas graced with unparalleled views of the Andaman Sea and gleaming swimming pools. For pure tranquillity and bliss, the exclusive Jara Spa is a pampering oasis framed by a century-old ficus tree, and every massage, Himalayan salt compress or foot reflexology treatment is crafted to help achieve balance and restoration. 

Experience culinary innovation and excellence, and dine onsite at PRU, a Michelin-starred restaurant. Fresh vegetables, fruits and herbs are sourced from the onsite farm, while seafood is line-caught in an active pursuit of sustainability while supporting local suppliers. Allow Head Chef Jimmy Ophorst to take you on a sumptuous gastronomic journey when you indulge in an unforgettable seven-course degustation or wine pairing experience.
offer_address: 60/1 Moo 6, Srisoonthorn Rd., Cherngtalay, Phuket

title: MGallery Opulence near World-Best Beach with Award-Winning Spa, Three Pools & Scenic Dining
description:
A boutique hilltop retreat, this award-winning romantic sanctuary is an idyllic haven for travellers who want the best of both worlds. Enjoy breathtaking Andaman Sea views and close proximity to Freedom Beach, ranked among the world’s best beaches.

Sink into total bliss at the award-winning spa, sip your favourite cocktails beside any of the three sparkling pools and taste your way through the hotel’s three restaurants, including dazzling Indian dishes at Tambu Phuket, which claims one of the best sunset viewpoints on the whole island.
offer_address: 39/9 Muen Ngern Road, Patong District, Amphur Kathu, Phuket 83150, Thailand

vendor_name: Novotel Phuket Kata Avista Resort and Spa
title: Phuket Novotel Tropical Escape near Kata Beach with Three Pools & Onsite Restaurant
description:
Experience the sun-drenched allure of Phuket from this sprawling Novotel sanctuary, perched atop a hillside and overlooking the aquamarine waters of the Andaman Sea, moments from Kata Beach's sands. Perfect for family-friendly times, splash around in the two-tier pools, and sip on drinks at the Zing Swim-Up Pool Bar while your kids stay engaged with a wide range of activities, including a Splashpad and the Little Ocean Kids' Club.

When hunger strikes, dine under the open sky at the elegant En Vogue, relishing gastronomical delights or indulge in a traditional Thai massage at the InBalance Spa. Beyond the resort, you'll be within easy reach of Phuket's countless riches, including Karon Beach's famous stretch and the island's most iconic sights, like the mighty Big Buddha and Patong are a short tuk-tuk ride away.
location_description: Novotel Phuket Kata Avista Resort & Spa
offer_address: 4/1 4 Soi Leam Sai, Kata, Karon District, Amphur Muang, Phuket, 83100, Thailand

title: Five-Star Phuket Hideaway with Luxury Suites Near Mai Khao Beach
description: Experience tropical splendour at the idyllic Avani+ Mai Khao Phuket Suites  - the ultimate spot for a private and intimate getaway. Escape the crowds at this spectacular hotel, boasting an enviable location near Mai Khao, one of Phuket’s most pristine beaches, and a gorgeous collection of suites. Make use of the incredible facilities onsite, including a glistening pool, nine mouthwatering eateries, a kids' club, a rock climbing wall and a state-of-the-art fitness centre. For a splash of sophistication, enjoy the swim-up bar, or head offsite and spend days exploring the local villages or surrounding islands.
offer_address: 887 Moo 3, Tumbon, Mai Khao, Thalang District, Phuket 83110, Thailand

vendor_name: Hotel Pullman Phuket Arcadia Naithon Beach
title: Phuket Pullman Five-Star Cliffside Haven with Infinity Pool & Onsite Day Spa
description: Set your sights on paradise with a stay at this sprawling five-star Phuket retreat, set on a headland overlooking the turquoise Andaman Sea. This tropical haven emanates contemporary glamour and sophistication from all corners - laze by two infinity pools, discover bliss at the Dhatri Spa or head to any of the resort’s three ultra-stylish bars for expertly shaken cocktails. Whatever you choose, you’ll only ever be moments from the picture-perfect white sands of Naithon Beach.

title: Beautiful Phuket Escape along Patong Beach
description: Escape to Thailand’s palm-fringed, turquoise beaches to discover what a tropical oasis feels like with a stay at Holiday Inn Resort Phuket, an IHG Hotel. Experience true relaxation as you lounge by the sparkling swimming pool, or head to the beach for a refreshing splash. Make a fruity cocktail at The Bar part of your pre-dinner ritual, finishing each day with a delicious meal at one of the four onsite restaurants serving up everything from Thai bites to perfectly seared steaks.
location_description: Holiday Inn Resort Phuket, an IHG Hotel

title: Tropical Phuket Paradise on the Marina with Pool Bar, Cafe & Restaurant
description: Soak up the utterly relaxed atmosphere, lush tropical gardens and convenient location on the marina with a comfortable stay at NH Boat Lagoon Phuket Resort. Sip cocktails by the impressive resort-style pool, treat yourself to midday pick-me-ups at Lighthouse Cafe, and indulge in casual all-day dining at Harbour restaurant. Wander along the nearby marina boardwalk and check out the area’s vibrant dining and shopping scene, and happily return to a luxurious and welcoming base.

title: Oceanview Phuket Escape with All-Day Dining Restaurant & Rooftop Bar
description: For five-star luxury and uber-friendly service along an incredible stretch of coastline, escape to The Sea Galleri by Katathani where a love of nature inspires every detail. Take a wander along the pristine sands of Karon Beach, wade around in one of two outdoor pools, indulge in delectable international cuisine at Palette Restaurant, sip a cocktail poolside or head up to the Sea in the Sky rooftop bar. This is the paradise you've dreamed of.
